name: Pirate Themed Fort Lytton Virtual Environment
name_original: Pirate Themed Fort Lytton Virtual Environment
description:
This is a virtual environment constructed in Unreal Engine 4 using the HTC Vive. It is a pirate themed representation of Fort Lytton in Brisbane, Australia.

Made by Ben Rayment

Interactions include:
- picking up objects and throwing them
- breakable objects
- firing gun
- cannon that fires
- head gaze gui
